greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,1) = 1, T(n,n) = n and for 1 < k < n: T(n,k) = T(n-1,k-1) + 2*T(n-1,k).
comment: Sum of n-th row = 3^(n-1): Sum_{k=1..n} T(n,k) = A000244(n-1);
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..120 of triangle, flattened
maple: seq(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n), n=1..12); # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 13 2019
mathematica: Table[T[n, k], {n, 12}, {k, n}]//Flatten (* _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 13 2019 *)
program: elif k eq n then return n;
[T(n,k): k in [1..n], n in [1..12]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 13 2019
[[T(n, k) for k in (1..n)] for n in (1..12)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 13 2019
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 18 2005
